bibl.title: Some "Ghost-Names" to disappear from Egyptian Onomastic.
bibl.note: 1. "Apatonis - Apepsonis". P. Lond. III (p. 235) 870, 10. - 2. "Pasinemos" and "Chothutes". S.B. I, 5376. - 3. "Seskapollon". P. Fouad 80, 19. - 4. "Senrouros" and "Trunitos". S.B. VIII, 9902. - 5. "Psenpatouris". O. Edfou III, 456.
